solution_line_template: There were {bee_eaters_multiplier}*{leopards} = <<{bee_eaters_multiplier}*{leopards}={bee_eaters}>>{bee_eaters} more bee-eaters at the zoo.
The total number of foxes and leopards is {arctic_foxes}+{leopards} = <<{arctic_foxes}+{leopards}={total_foxes_leopards}>>{total_foxes_leopards}.

The total number of animals is {alligators} alligators+{bee_eaters_L5_value} bee-eaters+{snakes} snakes+{arctic_foxes} tactic foxes+{leopards} leopards+{cheetahs} cheetahs = <<{alligators}+{bee_eaters_L5_value}+{snakes}+{arctic_foxes}+{leopards}+{cheetahs}={total_animals}>>{total_animals} animals.
